title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, December 15, 2020
description: "When anyone asks me about the Irish character, I say look at the trees. Maimed, stark and misshapen, but ferociously tenacious." –Edna O'Brien
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "When anyone asks me about the Irish character, I say look at the trees. Maimed, stark and misshapen, but ferociously tenacious." –Edna O'Brien
